passive1.name: Chilling Smite
passive1.effects: Upgrades Smite to Chilling Smite. Chilling Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing 28- 166 (based on level) true damage and stealing 20% of their movement speed for 2 seconds.

passive2.name: Tooth and Nail
passive2.effects: Basic attacks versus monsters deal 25 bonus physical damage and grant 15% bonus attack speed for 2 seconds. Damaging a monster by any means set it aflame, dealing an additional 50 magic damage over 5 seconds while causing you to restore 6 health per second for every enemy you're burning.

passive3.name: Restoration
passive3.effects: While in the jungle or river, grants 1 mana regeneration per 5 seconds for every 2% of missing mana.

passive4.effects: Killing large or epic monsters grants +50 bonus experience, and gain +50 bonus experience for each level higher the monster is than you.

active.name: Control
active.effects: Consume a charge to place a Control Ward. Charges are refilled by killing large monsters in the enemy jungle or returning to the shop.
